originalText.text: Dr Kalra is friendly and always professional. He explains everything in an easy to understand manner and is super patient. Both he and his staff are pleasant

text.text: Dr Kalra is friendly and always professional. He explains everything in an easy to understand manner and is super patient. Both he and his staff are pleasant

originalText.text: The front receptionist was very professional and courteous. My appointment was 11:15AM and I was attended to just as my appointment time said. The doctor, DR SMALL who attended to me was vey patient with me, he listened to the reason of my visit and showed concern of what I was saying. Also, he asked me if I have any questions. Overall, the service was very good.

originalText.text: Just started as a new patient.  The doctor on site was very knowledgeable and considerate as well as kind.  Hope to get to establish a good patient - doctor relationship. Thanks so much for the pleasant experience.  May Jehovah bless your doctor and staff  members as you continue to be a force for good in our Harlem community. Thanks again.

originalText.text: The reception is very kind the waiting is not long and the doctor take the time with you and explain everything where you understand. Yes I will recommend this place to anyone.

text.text: The reception is very kind the waiting is not long and the doctor take the time with you and explain everything where you understand. Yes I will recommend this place to anyone.

originalText.text: Since day one my experience with Kalra Amit has been amazing. He makes the procedures comfortable and he is funny and my visits are great. He explains everything and helps you understand everything. I would highly recommend and the ladies in there are welcoming and very nice. Clean environment and the wait is never long. Highly recommend more than 5 stars
